content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot
that's very likely https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86316 which I'll fix tonight
(the sources of the changes are a likely a mix of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86273 and https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86275)
